title: Olivia Garden Nano Thermic Ceramic Ion Brush, 2 1/8 Inch
description: Olivia Garden's Nano Thermic brushes are brushes with unique bristles designs, they have special wavy heat resistant bristles with soft tips that are gentle on hair and scalp. They heat up faster and retain heat longer which gives you superior and long-lasting hairstyles. They provide anti-bacterial protection which keeps your hair healthier and that makes it easier to style. They have extra large vents that allow greater airflow and that reduces on drying time. They add more shine to your hair and eliminate frizz and flyaways.

title: Shiseido Tsubaki Shining SET (Shampoo, Conditioner, Treatment 200g)
description: The hottest new hair care line in Japan! The Japanese camellia, or tsubaki, is delivered from Shiseido in a sexy pump bottle designed to resemble the Tsubaki flower. Full of luscious molten emulsion for conditioning all hair types.

title: Oshima Tsubaki Camellia Hair Care Oil - 60ml
description: 100% Camellia Japonica seed oil from Japan is the natural way to restore moisture and sheen to hair with just a few drops.Product Size:Net Volume: 60ml, or about 2.0 US fluid ounces.

title: Kerastase Initialiste Advanced Scalp and Hair Concentrate Treatment 2.2 oz
